name: Vip Body-Guard: Protect The President Boss 2021
name_original: Vip Body-Guard: Protect The President Boss 2021
description:
Vip Body-Guard: Protect The President Boss 2021
Protect the boss from rivals at any cost in president security games.
Donald Rump is going to speak with the audience. You are private Bodyguard for special rescue mission during the ceremony to protect the boss at any cost. In this game, you take on the role of a Secret Service bodyguard to save the boss. Your task is to protect the president of America President Donald Rump at any cost in VIP Body-Guard: Protect The President Boss 2021. even the cost of your own life. Be careful and act decisively, rigidly and effectively in critical situations. The safety of the life and health of the US leader depends on you in Bodyguard - Protect The President 2019.

Protect President Donald Rump the person leading the country into a new era. It's a huge responsibility, don't screw it up!

Play the role as a vip president guard and save them from any critical situation that will occur during president speak with the seminars in president games 2020. Always ready for action and protect the boss from rivals that are trying to kill the mr president in this vip bodyguard game. You'll need to try your entire president security games skills and protect the boss to become the vip body-guard of the town in president simulator 2021. Amazing contest for president security lovers who are trying to protect the boss by taking risk of their lives in mr president games. Enhance your special guards skills and protect the boss from enemies that are trying to kill him in Bodyguard - Protect The President 2019.

Play through various scenario to protect the president or resuce them from rivals in president security games. We will give you smooth game-play controls along with sizzling sound effects and animation that will give you more fun in Bodyguard - Protect The President 2019. The protection of mr president is your own arms, so be alert and protect the boss from any attack in president games 2020. Amazing tasks to do within limited time duration otherwise shooter will shoot the president and mission will be failed in VIP Body-Guard: Protect The President Boss 2021. Act like a pro security officer and rescue the or protect the president boss at any cost even at the cost of your own life in vipp bodyguard games for all protect the boss heroes.

VIP Body-Guard: Protect The President Boss 2021 Features:
- Easy to play but hard to become hero in president simulator 2021
- Handy game-play controls along with ultra-realistic graphics for vip bodyguard
- Thrilling and adventurous rescue missions for president security officer
- Challenging tasks for security officer
